name: Vimm's Lair Game Manual
summary: A VLM file is a game manual downloaded from Vimm's Lair, a website dedicated to preserving video game-related items. It contains a digital copy of a video game manual. VLM files can be opened in Vimm's Lair Manual Viewer, a Windows application that can be downloaded from the Vimm's Lair website.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
